product_name: Columbia Timber Tech Shell Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're headed to the slopes or just out for a walk in the rain, prepare yourself for wet winter weather in the waterproof, breathable Columbia Timber Tech(TM) shell jacket. Windproof nylon exterior with Omni-Dry(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable coating keeps you dry without letting you overheat; 100% sealed seams offer complete protection. Omni-Heat(R) thermal reflective lining fabric helps retain and circulate body heat for efficient insulation that doesn't weigh you down. Removable, adjustable storm hood fits well over ski helmets; removable powder skirt and adjustable drawcord hem keep snow from sneaking in. Underarm zippers allow venting; internal media and goggle pocket stores your ski essentials while you're at the lodge. Columbia Timber Tech shell jacket features Zip-In Interchange system, allowing you to integrate compatible Columbia insulating pieces (not included). Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're headed to the slopes or just out for a walk in the rain, prepare yourself for wet winter weather in the waterproof, breathable Columbia Timber Tech(TM) shell jacket.
